mapper.select: select * from town_post order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into town_post ( id, title, content, writer, read_cnt, reply_cnt, loc1, loc2, loc3, created_at, category_id ) values ( town_post_id.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0, 0, #{loc1}, #{loc2}, #{loc3}, current_timestamp, #{category_id} )
